posts.tweetText:
Request for Proposals announcement 

The Solana Foundation is looking for contributors to improve open-source developer tooling on Solana — with up to $75k in funding available.

Two new RFPs:
— Solana Math Library Improvements
— Python Renderer for Codama

Details & apply

Best network (2018-present) 
Best place for devs (2020-present) 
Best place for capital (2025 onwards)

These are additive; compounding; and also somewhat sequential

To build internet capital markets, Solana needs to be all of these things. No trilemmas.

Being the best place

Solana was born in America — with speed, sovereignty, and scale in its DNA 

This week, that spirit came alive in New York. Thank you to everyone who made Accelerate special.

Last November, America embraced crypto again. We doubled down on the US that week.

Solana was born in America, rooted in innovation and sovereignty — core American values.

The U.S. leads in talent and capital. Crypto empowers talent with opportunity and fuels economies with
Great seeing everyone at accelerate! Get your tickets for breakpoint 2025

thank you to the entire 
@solana
 ecosystem for making this moment possible - every sleepless night is worth it to give folks a platform to show what they know and what they’ve built

scale. ship. 

accelerate

→ http://solana.com/breakpoint

Hope you enjoyed accelerate.

we now put our heads down and get some work done for the rest of the yr — see you at breakpoint in december.

buy your tickets now before they’re sold out.

SAS is a pretty big deal. It allows for issuers to associate standard, templated data to wallets

- CEX's can issue proofs of user onboarding for trusted proof of humanity-like attestations
- Applications can associate their embedded wallets with a proof that allows apps to send

Introducing the Solana Attestation Service (SAS) 

A new open source, permissionless protocol to attest to anything — the trust layer for internet capital markets.

@solana
  community. 

This collection is more than a tribute; it’s a bold statement of identity, ownership, and technological

 for Scale or Die, our first iteration of a developer focused conference for the Solana Ecosystem. 

The quality of attendees was unmatched and we'll definitely do this again!
